prompt: You're exploring the woods when you find an unusually square boulder partially embedded in the grass. Upon closer inspection you discover it has a button one one side, almost invisible against the rock. What do you do?

options.text: Travel to a reasonable distance and throw stuff at it, hoping to hit.

optionResults.description: The rock explodes, blowing you and your belongings sky-high.
A small slot opens, and there is a couple of days worth of food inside. You grab it, and the slot shuts just behind your hand. Had you been any further away you would have missed it.

optionResults.description: There's a solid *click*, but nothing happens.

optionResults.description: You walk away from the boulder.

prompt: You're wandering, looking for food, when you find a dog. It runs at you, and to be safe you hold it down from behind. What do you do with it?

options.text: Kill it. It's a source of food.

optionResults.description: You kill the dog and, once all is said and done, you have about 3 days worth of food.
optionResults.message: [[NAME]] has slain a dog and obtained a couple of days worth of food.

optionResults.description: The dog escapes your clutches as you reach for your dagger. You curse, but it's already vanished into nature's arms.
optionResults.message: [[NAME]]'s decision hasn't come to anything this time.

optionResults.description: The dog scampers off, and you don't see where it goes.
optionResults.message: [[NAME]]'s decision hasn't come to anything this time.

optionResults.description: The dog's behavior clearly shows it wants you to follow it. Warily you do, and it leads you to a freshly killed deer that yields 5 days of food.
optionResults.message: [[NAME]] has found 5 days worth of food.

prompt: You come across a small stockpile of weapons on a metal plate in the floor. It doesn't look like there's anyone around.

options.text: Pick up a weapon from the pile. They wouldn't be here if they didn't want you to use them.
Leave the weapons. They're probably a trap.

optionResults.description: You close your grasp around a evil-looking mace, bracing yourself for an explosion, electric shock or other trap, but nothing comes.
A variety of traps go off. Your dead body is electrocuted, stabbed, fireballed and finally blown to bits.
You cannot move the weapons. They're stuck down with something incredibly strong. This has to be some kind of sick joke.
optionResults.message: [[NAME]] looks stupid trying to pick up a weapon welded to the ground.

optionResults.description: You walk away from the weapons.
optionResults.message: [[NAME]]'s decision hasn't come to anything this time.

prompt: There's a large metal sphere on the top of a nearby hill. It's obviously not part of the landscape, but it could be used as a trap of your own if you can roll it down onto somebody, or as a vantage point.

options.text: Leave. Somebody else may have had the same ideas as you.

optionResults.description: As you approach the boulder, a multitude of land mines go off. It was such a good idea, too.
You can see around you for quite a way, but can't see anything of note. Furthermore the boulder is immovable.
You can see absolutely nothing of interest in the surrounding area from the top. In frustration, and forgetting where you are, you let out a primal scream.
optionResults.message: A horrific scream echos across the arena, carrying overtones of rage and fear. Something, or someone, is out there.

optionResults.description: You walk away from the boulder.
optionResults.message: [[NAME]]'s decision hasn't come to anything this time.
